        public static double degreesBetween0And360(double degreesIn)
        Limit the given number of degrees to a value between 0 (inclusive) and 360 (exclusive). 
            Limit.degreesBetween0And360(0.0)    =   0.0
    Limit.degreesBetween0And360(127.3)  = 127.3

    Limit.degreesBetween0And360(-450.0) = 270.0
        Parameters:

        Returns:
